Search ulster.ac.uk

  • Ulster University Scholarships
  • Ulster University Scholarships

Scholarships finder

A comprehensive range of financial scholarships, awards and prizes are available to Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Research students.

There are 46 upcoming scholarships available.

  • View all Scholarships
  • View scholarships for Postgraduate students
  • View scholarships for Undergraduate students

Featured scholarships

Popular upcoming scholarships.

GREAT scholarship 2021

Open to students from India, Indonesia, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Egypt, Ghana and Kenya wishing to study at postgraduate level.

  • Study level: Undergraduate
  • Type: University Scholarships

Allen & Overy Scholarship

International Law Firm Allen & Overy supports the Allen & Overy Scholarships for the LLM in Access to Justice through the firm's Global Foundation.

  • Study level: Undergraduate
  • Type: University Scholarships
  • Campus: Magee

Asylum Seekers Scholarship

  • Study level: Undergraduate
  • Type: University Scholarships

Every effort is made to provide up-to-date details regarding the scholarship programmes listed on this page.

However, please be aware that final details of the eligibility, application and selection process for each of the scholarships will be provided at the time when the individual programmes open for applications.

Please read the application forms and associated information in detail at that time.
